guide.introduction_rendered:
You may have the most beautiful picture, diploma, or award that's hiding in the dark. Now you can illuminate it with the LED LilyPad Frame, and bring it to life.

Here are the materials you will need to build this beautiful project:

Relevant parts
  • LilyPad LED lights
  • 2N2222 NPN transistor
  • 1/4W 5% 100K resistor
  • Resistors, 1kΩ
  • PIR proximity sensor
  • small pc board
  • Cardboard
  • black and white wire
  • Photocell
  • 9V charger
  • Picture frame
Tools
  • Double-sided tape
  • Hot glue gun
  • Soldering iron

lines.text: Take the padded cardboard and cut out two squares .75 inches by .75 inches. (It has to be .30 inch thick.) Then cut each of the squares across the diagonal to make triangles.
